SEARCH
Package com.project.src.form

Class FormController

java.lang.Object
com.project.src.form.FormController
public class FormController extends Object
MVC Controller class for managing the form page. Handles interactions between the view and the model, including user input and com.project.src.form submission.
Version:
1.0

    • model

      public FormModel model

  • Constructor Details

    • FormController

      public FormController(processing.core.PApplet processing, controlP5.ControlP5 cp5, DBManager manager) throws NullPointerException
      Constructs a FormController with the specified PApplet and ControlP5 instances, and a DBManager.
      Parameters:
      processing - the PApplet instance used for rendering. Must not be null.
      cp5 - the ControlP5 instance used for user interface controls. Must not be null.
      manager - the DBManager instance used for database operations. Must not be null.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters are null

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw()
      Draws the form page. If there is a failure condition, displays an error message; otherwise, renders the form.

    • submitForm

      public boolean submitForm()
      Handles the form submission for login. Verifies the credentials and logs in the user. Displays an error message if credentials are invalid.

    • submitForm

      public boolean submitForm(boolean register)
      Handles the form submission for registration. Verifies the credentials and registers the user if the `register` flag is true. Displays an error message if credentials are invalid or registration fails.
      Parameters:
      register - if true, registers a new user; if false, performs login
